short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the kick.com viewing experience by providing a fullscreen chat overlay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Messages flow seamlessly from right to left, providing an immersive chat environment while you enjoy your content. This script works in both live and VOD (Video on Demand) modes.

Features
- Fullscreen chat overlay for kick 
- Compatible with both live and VOD (Video on Demand) modes 
- Supports various message types, including user bans, gifted subscriptions, etc.
- Anti-Spam Setting: A configurable option that reduces spam by preventing multiple identical messages from appearing simultaneously.

Feel free to collaborate, report bugs, or suggest improvements on our GitHub repository.

This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Kick or any content streamed on the platform. It is an independent tool and has no connection to Kick's services or content creators.
